meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a blizzard.
meanings.sent1: The blizzardly winds howled through the night, chilling us to the bone.
meanings.sent2: The blizzardly conditions made it impossible to see more than a few feet ahead.
meanings.sent3: The blizzardly snowflakes danced in the air, creating a magical winter wonderland.
meanings.sent4: Her blizzardly temperament could freeze even the warmest of hearts.
meanings.sent5: The blizzardly landscape was both beautiful and treacherous, a true winter spectacle.

meanings.definition: In a manner characteristic of a blizzard.
meanings.sent1: She ran blizzardly through the snow, her laughter echoing in the frosty air.
meanings.sent2: The snow fell blizzardly, covering everything in a thick blanket of white.
meanings.sent3: He spoke blizzardly fast, trying to get his words out before the storm hit.
meanings.sent4: The news spread blizzardly through the small town, causing panic among the residents.
meanings.sent5: The wind howled blizzardly, carrying with it the promise of a fierce storm.
